definitions.definition: One who becomes unable to pay his or her debts ; an insolvent person; a bankruptee .
A trader who secretes himself, or does certain other acts tending to defraud his creditors .

main_definition: One who becomes unable to pay his or her debts ; an insolvent person; a bankruptee .
secondary_definitions: ( UK , law , obsolete ) A trader who secretes himself, or does certain other acts tending to defraud his creditors .
